{{ $currentBranch := getenv "CURRENT_BRANCH" }} {{ $version := replaceRE "[a-zA-Z/]+" "" $currentBranch }} {{ $versionMap := split (replace (printf "%-10s" $version) " " "0") "." }} {{ $majorVersion := int (index $versionMap 0) }} {{ $minorVersion := int (index $versionMap 1) }} {{ $useOldHttpApi := or (lt $majorVersion 1) (and (eq $majorVersion 1) (le $minorVersion 0)) }} {{ if or (eq $currentBranch "master") (not $useOldHttpApi) }} {{ if eq ( .Vars ) nil }} 
curl -H "Content-Type: application/graphql+-" localhost:8080/query -XPOST -d '
{{ .Code }}' | python -m json.tool | less
{{ else }} 
curl -H "Content-Type: application/json" localhost:8080/query -XPOST -d '{
    "query": "{{ .Code }}",
    "variables": {{ .Vars }}
}' | python -m json.tool | less
{{ end }} {{ else }} 
curl localhost:8080/query -XPOST {{ with .Vars }}-H 'X-Dgraph-Vars: {{.}}' {{ end }}-d '
{{ .Code }}' | python -m json.tool | less
{{ end }}
